goals__remit:
The IAO is the umbrella association for national organisations representing the rights and interests of Featured Artists in the Music Industry. 
  
Our principal interests are transparency, the protection of intellectual property and a fair relfection of the value an artist's work generates.
relevant_communication:
We have organised our own campaign "Artists in Europe" in Bruxelles where we worked with several MEPs from across the political spectrum. 
 
We support the "Fair Internet Campaign" with session musicians and actors.  
 
We write regularly letters to the Commission. 
We propose amendments to any proposals of directive that concerns our issues. 
 
We have a working group dedicated to the european affairs.
